desc.en: Ayane tries to repair the helicopter by herself but eventually collapses from exhaustion. Sensei convinces Ayane that it's important to take care of her health, helps her repair the helicopter, and then takes a commemorative photo of her.
desc.jp: Ayane tries to repair the helicopter by herself but eventually collapses from exhaustion. Sensei convinces Ayane that it's important to take care of her health, helps her repair the helicopter, and then takes a commemorative photo of her.
desc.zh_cn: 没办法抛弃急躁的心情，并独自修理着直升机的{cf绫音}最后因为虚脱而昏倒。老师好好地劝导{cf绫音}，说管理自己的身体状况是很重要的事，之后一起帮忙修理直升机并帮{cf绫音}拍了纪念照。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 记录家庭账本、古董收集
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 记录家庭账本、古董收集

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp: Azusa went to the beach late at night. She pours her heart out to Sensei upon her emotions being at ease.
desc.zh_cn: 深夜坐在在海边的{cf梓}。心中感到一阵从容后，便将自己的心情告诉老师。

desc.en: Hina wants to learn to swim, so Sensei rushes to help her. Unfortunately, their one-on-one swimming lesson takes an unexpected turn when Thugs run amok on the beach.
desc.jp: Hina wants to learn to swim, so Sensei rushes to help her. Unfortunately, their one-on-one swimming lesson takes an unexpected turn when Thugs run amok on the beach.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳奈}说想要学游泳，因此老师匆匆忙忙跑去见她。不过，两人温馨的1:1游泳课却因为在海边引起骚动的混混们上演了意想不到的发展。

hobby.jp: 睡眠、休憩

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.jp: Iori secretly buys a tube to practice swimming ahead of summer camp, but is caught by Sensei. Sensei learns of Iori's predicament and helps her practice swimming.
desc.zh_cn: 即将到来的夏季集中训练，{cf伊织}为了要练习游泳而暗自购买了泳圈，却被老师发现了。老师知道{cf伊织}的苦衷以后，便协助她一起练习游泳。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Sensei makes many memories with Mimori at the beach. As the vacation draws to a close, Mimori, feeling sad that it's over, acts uncharacteristically childishly.
desc.jp: Sensei makes many memories with Mimori at the beach. As the vacation draws to a close, Mimori, feeling sad that it's over, acts uncharacteristically childishly.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cf三森}一起在海边留下各种回忆。在休假的尾声到来之际，{cf三森}因为舍不得而不自觉地开始对老师撒娇。

少女漫画、家事全般

desc.en: On an early morning, Sensei goes for a walk along the beach and runs into Miyako, who is also out for her morning exercise.
desc.jp: On an early morning, Sensei goes for a walk along the beach and runs into Miyako, who is also out for her morning exercise.
desc.zh_cn: 清晨时分，老师在海边散步的时候遇见了出门做晨间运动的{cf都子}。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Sensei spots Shiroko leaving the resort in the early morning and goes after her. They return to the beach they had barbecued at the night before, and together they reminisce on the memories they made.
desc.jp: Sensei spots Shiroko leaving the resort in the early morning and goes after her. They return to the beach they had barbecued at the night before, and together they reminisce on the memories they made.
desc.zh_cn: 在所有人都在沉睡的凌晨时分，老师发现{cf白子}走出渡假村外，出于担心便跟了上去。在一连串的对话中，老师得知{cf白子}想要在回到日常生活之前，用眼睛好好记住和大家一起创造的快乐回忆。

desc.en: Late at night, Sensei arrives at the beach after receiving a MomoTalk message from Ui. Ui offers Sensei an iced Americano and suggests they take a walk on the beach.
desc.jp: Late at night, Sensei arrives at the beach after receiving a MomoTalk message from Ui. Ui offers Sensei an iced Americano and suggests they take a walk on the beach.
desc.zh_cn: 为了商量一些事，老师收到{cf忧}的MomoTalk之后，来到了海边。{cf忧}递给老师一杯冰美式，提议一起在海边散步。

name.en: A Fluttering Heart Near a Bonfire
name.jp: A Fluttering Heart Near a Bonfire

desc.en: Wakamo waits for Sensei in the fierce rain and wind so she can keep her promise with Sensei. Sensei realizes that all the chaos she's been causing is because of the promise they made, so Sensei travels through the rain and wind to get to Wakamo. Sensei sits by a bonfire with Wakamo to warm her up and listens to her story.
desc.jp: Wakamo waits for Sensei in the fierce rain and wind so she can keep her promise with Sensei. Sensei realizes that all the chaos she's been causing is because of the promise they made, so Sensei travels through the rain and wind to get to Wakamo. Sensei sits by a bonfire with Wakamo to warm her up and listens to her story.
desc.zh_cn: 面对询问是否还记得半途而废的「约定」的{cf若藻}，老师回应了希望可以等到工作结束。之后，即使联系了也没有回应，天气渐渐恶化……为了找{cf若藻}奔向暴风雨中时，看见了守护「约定」暴露于风雨中，一心一意持续等着自己的她的身影。必须温暖被风雨冻僵的{cf若藻}而筑起营火，两人度过了安稳的时光。

desc.en: Evening arrives and the group begins to prepare for the fireworks. Just as the fireworks are about to begin, a firecracker flies over from the thugs' side and a war breaks out.
desc.jp: Evening arrives and the group begins to prepare for the fireworks. Just as the fireworks are about to begin, a firecracker flies over from the thugs' side and a war breaks out.
desc.zh_cn: 晚间时刻，正在准备放烟火的一行人。烟火就要开始了，但是太妹们丢了一个鞭炮过来，瞬间将场地转为战场。

hobby.jp: 高いところに登る、観察日記を書く
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 登上高处、记录观察日记

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

不请自来的{cn美食研究会}（２）

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: After some twists and turns, the Foreclosure Task Force members stabilize the resort. Enjoying a long-awaited peaceful evening, they have more honest conversations than usual, inspired by the summer beach.
desc.jp: After some twists and turns, the Foreclosure Task Force members stabilize the resort. Enjoying a long-awaited peaceful evening, they have more honest conversations than usual, inspired by the summer beach.
desc.zh_cn: 几经波折后终于将渡假胜地的复原告一段落的{cn对策委员会}一行人，在夏季的海滩上享用了烤肉。在这段时间里，他们才真正享受到了能够忘却现实的快乐假期。

{sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?

然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: To personally witness the mysterious secret of Yatoura Village, the RABBIT Squad members begin a nighttime operation.
desc.jp: To personally witness the mysterious secret of Yatoura Village, the RABBIT Squad members begin a nighttime operation.
desc.zh_cn: {cnRABBIT小队}成员们为了亲眼确认夜户浦村的不可思议秘密，展开夜间作战。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

desc.en: Miyu reluctantly agrees to try to teach the novice fisherman how to properly fish. They're eventually joined by one of the villagers, and the group enjoy a delicious fish barbecue.
desc.jp: Miyu reluctantly agrees to try to teach the novice fisherman how to properly fish. They're eventually joined by one of the villagers, and the group enjoy a delicious fish barbecue.
desc.zh_cn: 在钓客的拜托下，{cf美优}决定教他怎么钓鱼。在{cnRABBIT小队}成员们钓鱼的时候，村民们带着海鲜到来，大家一起享受着BBQ度过愉快的时光。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.jp: The 113th track in Blue Archive OST, a theme song for the RABBIT Squad. It has become a meme song symbolizing Blue Archive.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，“RABBIT小队”的主题曲。其目前已经成为象征蔚蓝档案的梗曲。

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

hobby.jp: なし

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
